text: Charles Koffi Diby (7 September 1957 – 7 December 2019) was an Ivorian politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Ivory Coast from 2012 to 2016. He was born in Bouaké, Côte d’Ivoire. Diby died on 7 December 2019 of problems caused by anorexia at his home in Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire, aged 62.Côte d’Ivoire : décès de Charles Koffi Diby, président du Conseil économique et social ==References== ==Other websites== *article on Diby's visit to Brazil Category:1957 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from anorexia Category:Ivorian politicians
title: Charles Koffi Diby
